member.summary: The Query string supplied was invalid or improperly formed

member.summary: The Query string supplied was invalid because it contains a duplicate token

member.summary: The Query string supplied was invalid because a supplied token was null

member.name: P:System.SR.WorkerThreadWakeupFailed
member.summary: Unable to wakeup the worker thread to create an object in MTA

member.summary: ClassName not initialized.

member.summary: Class name does not match.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentAttributeProperty
member.summary: Every property added to the class for WMI property has attributes set to define its behavior in Visual Studio designer and also to define a TypeConverter to be used.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentAutoCommitProperty
member.summary: Property to show the commit behavior for the WMI object. If true, WMI object will be automatically saved after each property modification.(ie. Put() is called after modification of a property).

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentClassBegin
member.summary: An Early Bound class generated for the WMI class.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentConstructors
member.summary: Below are different overloads of constructors to initialize an instance of the class with a WMI object.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentCreatedClass
member.summary: Private property to hold the name of WMI class which created this class.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentCreatedWmiNamespace
member.summary: Private property to hold the WMI namespace in which the class resides.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentCurrentObject
member.summary: The current WMI object used

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentDateConversionFunction
member.summary: Datetime conversion functions ToDateTime and ToDmtfDateTime are added to the class to convert DMTF datetime to System.DateTime and vice-versa.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentEmbeddedObject
member.summary: Private variable to hold the embedded property representing the instance.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentEnumeratorImplementation
member.summary: Enumerator implementation for enumerating instances of the class.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentFlagForEmbedded
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the instance is an embedded object.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentGetInstances
member.summary: Different overloads of GetInstances() help in enumerating instances of the WMI class.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentIsPropNull
member.summary: Functions Is<PropertyName>Null() are used to check if a property is NULL.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentLateBoundObject
member.summary: Underlying lateBound WMI object.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentLateBoundProperty
member.summary: Property returning the underlying lateBound object.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentManagementPath
member.summary: The ManagementPath of the underlying WMI object.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentManagementScope
member.summary: ManagementScope of the object.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentOriginNamespace
member.summary: Property returns the namespace of the WMI class.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentPrivateAutoCommit
member.summary: Member variable to store the 'automatic commit' behavior for the class.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentPrototypeConverter
member.summary: TypeConverter to handle null values for ValueType properties

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentResetProperty
member.summary: Functions Reset<PropertyName> are added for Nullable Read/Write properties. These functions are used by VS designer in property browser to set a property to NULL.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentShouldSerialize
member.summary: Functions ShouldSerialize<PropertyName> are functions used by VS property browser to check if a particular property has to be serialized. These functions are added for all ValueType properties ( properties of type Int32, BOOL etc.. which cannot be set to n ...

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentStaticManagementScope
member.summary: Private member variable to hold the ManagementScope which is used by the various methods.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentStaticScopeProperty
member.summary: Public static scope property which is used by the various methods.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentSystemObject
member.summary: Property pointing to an embedded object to get System properties of the WMI object.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentSystemPropertiesClass
member.summary: Embedded class to represent WMI system Properties.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentTimeSpanConvertionFunction
member.summary: Time interval functions ToTimeSpan and ToDmtfTimeInterval are added to the class to convert DMTF Time Interval to System.TimeSpan and vice-versa.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentToDateTime
member.summary: Converts a given datetime in DMTF format to System.DateTime object.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentToDmtfDateTime
member.summary: Converts a given System.DateTime object to DMTF datetime format.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentToDmtfTimeInterval
member.summary: Converts a given System.TimeSpan object to DMTF Time interval format.

member.name: P:System.SR.CommentToTimeSpan
member.summary: Converts a given time interval in DMTF format to System.TimeSpan object.

member.name: P:System.SR.EmbeddedComment
member.summary: If the embedded property is strongly typed then, to strongly type the property to the type of

member.name: P:System.SR.EmbeddedComment2
member.summary: the embedded object, you have to do the following things.

member.name: P:System.SR.EmbeddedComment3
member.summary: \t1. Generate Managed class for the WMI class of the embedded property. This can be done with MgmtClassGen.exe tool or from Server Explorer.

member.name: P:System.SR.EmbeddedComment4
member.summary: \t2. Include the namespace of the generated class.

member.name: P:System.SR.EmbeddedComment5
member.summary: \t3. Change the property get/set functions so as return the instance of the Managed class.
